title: Dreaming Pegasus

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Trap someone in your Dreams.
-You may trap yourself in your Dreams once.
-When the PMCS starts, you may trap 2 people each night, and If they are a Pale Moon, they will not be roleblocked through immunity.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: -Your trapped target is granted Invincible Defense the night you trap them, but will be roleblocked through immunity the night after.
